levels.description: Stops attacking and generates a total of <@ba.vup>{value}</> DP over the skill duration. Throws the banner to the location of the allied unit with the lowest HP percentage within range, granting them DEF <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</> and restoring their HP equal to <@ba.vup>{atk_to_hp_recovery_ratio:0%}</> of Saileach's ATK every second. When the skill ends, retrieve the banner
